data.message:
A lot of people riding on his nuts(as expected). I love his new flow, but this song is awful. The chorus is sub par, annoying and seems to lack a "phenomenal" feel. I found myself feeling tortured as I worked my way through the chorus to hear his verses, I mean cmon this is what listeners are gonna hear the most why does it have to be annoying? His first verse was trash, the last two were good. The beat sucked also but hopefully that movie won't.

His "Rap God" flow however worked well on...

"Vagas"
"Speedom"
"Best Friend"
"Detroit Vs Everybody "
"Psychopathic Killer"

replies.message: Beat and hook wasn't the greatest but the bars were crazy that last verse was insane, beat could have been better but his rapping and lyrical ability is what separates him from other rappers he's still the best in the game at the moment as an overall skilled mc
You have to remember dawg that this song it's just a soundtrack for a movie so Em' don't needed necessary to push himself u know what im sayin'
No wizkhalifa worked hard for see again ...i thouqht eminem will drop a sonq better than see you again but i was wronq eminem is wack disapointed by him i thnk he should retire
Lol you can't compare wiz Khalifa to Eminem there completely different wiz makes some ok tracks he's not a lyricist though
Stop hate'n u know its phenomenal lol
